overview: A handsome warlord, ‘Taari’  is fast transitioning into a wolf due to the curse of the dogs that has been placed on him. He must immediately find the cure to this curse or forever be damned. The plot thickens when he discovers that the prince of the village, ‘Adetiba’  will stop at nothing to prevent him from getting the cure he desperately needs. Meanwhile, ‘Princess Morenike’ who is desperately in love with Taari, goes against her brother and goes beyond limits to get the cure for her betrothed.
title: King Invincible
